title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Posing practice starts! One, two, three! One, two, three!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Kasumi-chan! We’re currently interviewing everyone about the upcoming Shuffle Festival, do you have a moment?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>An interview? Fufufu.... Kasumin has been waiting for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Please tell us about your enthusiasm, how you feel towards the festival, or what’s driving you right now, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Right to the point then! You should expect to see a different Kasumin there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>A different Kasumi-chan....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, Kasumin is cute no matter what, so my cuteness will remain the same.... Or maybe it’ll even be double the usual? But Kasumin loves everyone’s songs, so Kasumin is practicing hard to match them. Please look forward to that version of Kasumin♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That sounds amazing.... I can’t wait to see that too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Since Kasumin is singing another club member’s song, Kasumin would like to steal-.... Or rather, use everyone’s good points as a reference to power myself up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I can’t afford to lose! Let me practice posing with you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
